title: Size and morphology control over MOF-74 crystals
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20604-20608
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03943B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chunhui Wu, Xinxin Chu, Xiaoling Wu, He Zhou, Youshi Zeng, Dongxu Wang, Wei Liu
This work describes the effects of various synthetic conditions, including the reactant ratio, reaction solution, acidity and capping agent on the size and morphology of MOF-74 crystals to understand the regulated principle of MOF-74 crystals.
